title: Astros Take 2-1 Series Lead After a Masterful Outing by Gerrit Cole
text:
NEW YORK—Gerrit Cole isn’t the most famous pitcher in this postseason. At 29 years old, he’s not even the most accomplished pitcher on his own team. But he is dominating hitters like no other pitcher in these playoffs, and the Houston Astros are two wins from the World Series because of it.

Cole threw seven scoreless innings in Game 3 of the American League Championship Series on Tuesday, helping the Astros to a 4-1 win over the New York Yankees at Yankee Stadium. Houston leads the best-of-seven series, 2-1.

...
description: Gerrit Cole threw seven scoreless innings in Game 3 of the American League Championship Series, helping the Astros to a 4-1 win over the New York Yankees at Yankee Stadium.
